content: I have a body_id: hir::BodyId and I'm trying to do tcx.hir().local_def_id(body_id.hir_id), but the call is panicking saying there's no entry for that hir_id. It sounds like in that means the body is defined in a different crate, but I'm only compiling one create. Does anyone have tips for how to debug this?
I think the HirId you should pass to local_def_id is the ID of the body's owner. You can use body_owner to get that ID
Thanks, that worked. Now I have a different problem, but I'll work on that for a bit :)
eholk has marked this topic as resolved.
